## Auth.login() method

Logs in the user with the specified credentials.

**Signature:**

```typescript
login(credentials: AuthInfo): Promise<LoginResult>;
```

</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[LoginResult](./foundation-comms.loginresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;
